channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Openshift Enterprise
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Openshift Enterprise

item.title: CVE-2016-8651|2024-08-06T02:27:41.203Z -- red%20hat -- openshift%20enterprise
item.description: An input validation flaw was found in the way OpenShift 3 handles requests for images. A user, with a copy of the manifest associated with an image, can pull an image even if they do not have access to the image normally, resulting in the disclosure of any information contained within the image.

item.title: CVE-2016-8631|2024-08-06T02:27:41.243Z -- red%20hat -- openshift%20enterprise
item.description: The OpenShift Enterprise 3 router does not properly sort routes when processing newly added routes. An attacker with access to create routes can potentially overwrite existing routes and redirect network traffic for other users to their own site.
